title: Супергероям нужен ментор: Обзор Dispatch
contents: Подходящий к концу осенний период оказался довольно увлекательным с точки зрения наблюдения за индустрией. Мы стали свидетелями краха Call of Duty, очередной серии промахов от Microsoft, воскрешения Battlefield, становления ARC Raiders и так далее. Однако даже на этом фоне Dispatch не только не затерялась, но и стала ярким событием.

title: Dispatch - Steam Awards!
contents: Seven years after we started AdHoc, Dispatch finally launched with a story we always hoped to tell -- one rooted in flawed heroes, messy relationships, and the quiet moments that define who they really are.If Dispatch resonated with you, if you connected with Robert, Blonde Blazer, Visi, or any of our deeply imperfect heroes trying to do the right thing, we would be incredibly grateful for your consideration in this year’s Steam Awards under Outstanding Story-Rich Game.From day one, our goal wasn’t scale or spectacle -- it was to make something human. Something where choices mattered not just because of their branching consequences, but because they revealed a bit of who you are under pressure. If that experience meant something to you, your nomination would mean the world to our team.We’re spotlighting Outstanding Story-Rich Game here, but you’re encouraged to nominate Dispatch in any category you think we’ve earned: Best Soundtrack, Outstanding Visual Style, Game of the Year, and others!There are so many incredible games deserving of your vote, and we’re deeply grateful you gave ours a chance. Thank you for playing, and for helping this weird little superhero game find the audience it has today.

title: Dispatch Full Series (PC) Review
contents: I mentioned previously that I was a little skeptical when I first saw Dispatch, not because of any indicators about its quality—or lack thereof, for that matter—but because I honestly felt the industry as a whole was so burnt out on these kinds of episodic that they quietly died alongside Telltale Games. I guess I didn’t realize how much I would miss something until it was gone, because seeing a new one in 2025 felt genuinely refreshing. When I sat down with AdHoc Studio a few months ago, both the passion for what they were making and the brief bit of gameplay I got to see sold me on the concept, but sitting down and playing Dispatch sold me on the game. Not only is it a compelling, funny and well-written narrative experience, its core gameplay is so well executed that it could genuinely work as its own standalone game. As I mentioned a bit in my preview, Dispatch puts players in the relatively normal shoes of Robert Robertson (AKA Mechaman), who, in a confrontation with a... Read more

title: Dispatch is OUT NOW!
contents: The day we’ve all been waiting for is finally here! We’re thrilled to announce that Episodes 1 and 2 of Dispatch are officially out in the world. So pour yourself a fresh cup of coffee and break out your finest blue polo, it’s time to start your SDN adventure.10% Launch Discount!To thank everyone who participates in the episodic journey with us, we're launching with a 10% discount for those who purchase the game week 1. Whether you're playing with the community week to week, or are saving everything to binge later, we want to say thanks for being there for us at the start. About the Digital Deluxe EditionThe Art of Dispatch: Digital Artbook - 100+ pagesWe made a lot of art for this game. So we thought we'd share it all by compiling a digital artbook for folks who like to see the behind the scenes on how the world of Dispatch was created. 4 Digital Comics - 45+ pagesWe had more stories and scenes than we were able to fit inside the game, so we decided to partner with 15 incredible artists and others from the world of comics to bring you 6 additional tales that expand on our story and characters.Issue #1 - Splash & The Last BenderIssue #2 - Pas De Deux & ShellshockIssue #3 - Get UpIssue #4 - The Death of Mecha ManAbout the Dispatch Original SoundtrackWith over 3 hours of synth driven score and crunchy retro tracks to dispatch to, Andrew Arcadi’s soundtrack brings the world of Dispatch to life. Cinematic, emotional, and full of heart, it’s the sound of heroes just trying to do better. The story continues next week.If you've been following along, you already know that Dispatch is releasing episodically over the course of 4 weeks. We’ll be dropping two episodes a week for the next three weeks. Look out for episodes 3 and 4 premiering on October 29th, episodes 5 and 6 on November 5th, and episodes 7 and 8 on November 12th. Take some time in between episodes to chat about your choices at the digital watercooler with our wonderful Dispatch community on Discord. Follow our Socials to stay up to date with the latest announcements. And if you enjoy the game, let us know! Post about it. Tell your friends. Show us your fan art of your favorite Z-Teamer. We want to know what you love about Dispatch! Thank you, Dispatchers!All of us here at AdHoc are so excited to finally put this game in your hands. Thank you to everybody who has stood by our side on the journey to release day. Your support means the world to us, and we hope you have a blast playing the first two episodes of Dispatch.

title: Будни супергероя-банкрота: Создатели Tales from the Borderlands объявили о релизе Dispatch
contents: AdHoc Studio объявила о релизе на ПК и PlayStation 5 интерактивного приключения Dispatch. В честь этого был опубликован новый трейлер.

title: Неуязвимый объединяется с Vox Machina: Предварительный обзор Dispatch: Episodes 1-2
contents: В последние несколько лет жанр интерактивных киноигр оказался в подвешенном состоянии. С одной стороны, у нас есть многочисленные проекты небольших команд и инди-разработчиков, многие из которых решили вернуться в эпоху FMV.

title: Dispatch Launches Episodes 1 & 2 – Episode Release Schedule Included
contents: The highly anticipated episodic interactive experience Dispatch is coming in hot, and players won’t have to wait months to keep playing. As was mentioned in our Dispatch Hands-Off Preview Event, the first two episodes of the superhero workplace comedy are set to land on October 22nd, 2025. Following this, the game will release two episodes a week for three weeks and a total of eight episodes. The schedule will be released as follows: * Episode 3&4 – Oct 29th, 2025; * Episode 5&6 – Nov 5th, 2025; * Episode 7&8 – Nov 12th, 2025; At the time of full release, CGM will publish a full review of the entire series as a complete experience—as opposed to our stilted coverage of episodic games in the past. Having played Dispatch Episode 1 & 2, however, I will say, so far, the game is incredibly promising, feeling like Invincible if it were written for adults. Dispatch is the collaboration between AdHoc Studios and Critical Role.... Read more

title: Dispatch Premieres October 22
contents: We’re thrilled to announce that Dispatch launches on October 22, 2025! Watch our release date trailer for a closer look at what’s in store:We’re also announcing that Dispatch will be released episodically.On Wednesday October 22nd the first 2 episodes will premiere.  And a week later – on Wednesday October 29th – episodes 3 and 4 will drop, and so on.2 episodes a week, for 4 weeks. We’ve always loved the promise of the episodic model for games – the conversation and speculation it generates, the discrete bite-sized pieces of content that are easier to consume, and if you get to it late, it allows you some time to catch up with everyone and not feel like you’ve been completely left behind. We’re excited to finally be able to share that experience with everyone starting on October 22nd. Until then, jump into our Discord, hit that Wishlist button, and follow along on socials.Thanks again for your tremendous patience and excitement for our game. Dispatch is our team’s first game, years in the making, and we can’t wait to release it into the world.

title: A First Look At Dispatch—Calling All Heroes
contents: I was actually pretty interested in Dispatch when it was first revealed during The Game Awards 2024. I feel like there’s been a fair bit of time between the exhausting release of episodic games and the genre’s…let’s say hibernation that the prospect of a new one was actually exciting again. Not only that, but rather than being based on an existing property, this game was going to be its own unique story and ideas, which only sweetened the pot. CGM got a chance to sit down with AdHoc Studio to get a first look at Dispatch, and it made a pretty impressive first impression. Not only does it look to tell a compelling and engaging story, rounded out by a cast of complex and interesting characters, but it’s got a lot more depth to its gameplay than the average point-and-click inspired narrative game. COO & Dispatch Creative Director Nick Herman introduced us to the company in about as blunt a way as possible, saying, “We were founded in 2018 by two writers and two... Read more

title: Dispatch Tops The Charts of Steam Next Fest
contents: Dispatchers! None of us at AdHoc were prepared for this level of love and support. Of course, we hoped you’d enjoy the little demo we put together for Steam Next Fest, but seeing just how many of you played it, loved it, and shared your excitement has been beyond anything we imagined. So from all of us at the studio, thank you.Our demo for Dispatch was one of the most played demos at June’s Steam Next Fest. The demo received over300,000 downloads & 2,000 Overwhelmingly Positive reviews.As a result, Dispatch has surpassedTo say we’re blown away would be an understatement. It’s been incredible seeing the response to Dispatch. We know we’re making a weird thing, so watching hundreds of thousands of people check out the demo and actually connect with it has meant a lot to everyone on the team. We’re listening, we’re reading everything, and we’re just really grateful for the support.We’re so thankful to everyone who’s played, streamed, reviewed, or even just hit “Wishlist.” This game means a lot to us. And your support makes all the difference. Dispatch launches later this year on console and PC via Steam. Until then, jump into our Discord, hit that Wishlist button, and follow along on socials. We’ve got more to share soon—and we can’t wait to take this weird ride with you. Thanks for being a part of this journey!

title: Dispatch Demo Released!
contents: We’re thrilled to announce the first-ever playable demo of Dispatch during Steam Next Fest! To kick off the release, we've cut together a quick trailer that premiered at the PC Gaming Show to help spread the word. Play the DemoIn this demo, you’ll dive into Robert’s first day as an SDN Dispatcher, meeting new co-workers and encountering the infamous Z-Team—ex-supervillains enrolled in the Phoenix Program, an initiative aimed at rehabilitating them (or at least trying to).About DispatchDispatch, AdHoc Studio’s debut game, is a superhero workplace comedy where choices matter, set against the backdrop of modern-day Los Angeles.You’ll step into the shoes of Robert Robertson—better known as Mecha Man—who finds himself without his signature suit after losing a battle with his nemesis. With no choice but to rebuild, Robert takes on a new role at SDN, a hero-for-hire agency, trading combat for a desk job dispatching superheroes. About AdHoc StudioWe are a small independent game studio loosely based in Los Angeles, CA, but have people on our team from all over the states, Canada, Brazil, and other parts of the world. Our studio was founded by folks who previously worked at Telltale Games, Ubisoft, and Night School Studio, writing and directing on critically acclaimed titles like The Walking Dead, The Wolf Among Us, and Tales from the Borderlands. Much like those games, Dispatch puts interactive narrative at the heart of the experience.What's NextDispatch is coming out this year, so the whole team is heads down finishing it! There's only 6 months left inside 2025, so yeah, we're equally freaked out and committed to getting it done on time. Also, it's worth calling out that while the demo does not have full controller or Steam Deck support at this time, we plan to include those features in the full release later this year. Additionally, we’re working on localization across multiple languages—stay tuned for updates on player interface options, subtitles, and supported features coming at launch. Join Other DispatchersWe're incredibly fortunate to have such a welcoming and engaged community of Dispatchers on our Discord! If you’d like to connect with fellow players while waiting for launch, join the official AdHoc Studio server—where our development team actively chats with the community and shares exclusive updates.Happy Dispatching!

title: Aaron Paul stars in Dispatch, a story based superhero management game from ex-Telltale devs
contents: Aaron Paul, he of a heartbreakingly fraught performance as Todd in Bojack Horseman, and also Breaking Bad, is starring in a new strategy story game from AdHoc, a studio with ex-Telltale developers at the helm. Dispatch is a story-focused strategy game where you’ll play a broke superhero trying to get himself a new mech suit by working at a hero dispatch center. Having trouble tracking a trailer down for this one, but you can find it here on Steam. Wait. I’ve found it! Leaving that last bit in though. Consider it my gift to you reader. The gift of visible workflow at 4am. Read more
